title: Designing an Evaluation Framework for Online Library Research Guides

context.prior_knowledge: Basic understanding of academic information retrieval required
context.additional_context: Research Guide Competency Development Applying Cognitive Load Theory in Smartphone-Based Environments

learning_goals: Learners can identify three cognitive load-inducing factors in the online library research guide
Learners can apply chunking techniques to structure information in the research guide
Learners can propose visual design improvements to reduce extraneous cognitive load
Through project-based assessment, learners can submit practical research guide improvement proposals

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
